name: Milionesy
overview: MilioNESy is a homebrew game based on "Who Wants To Be A Millionare" but it asks only Nintendo-related questions. To win the game, you need to correctly answer 15 questions. Score is calculated by how much time is left when you choose an option and the number of correct questions you answered. If SCORE option in game is enabled, then using a lifeline will result in point penalty. The farther you go, the penalty is bigger. You can choose from 6 Lifelines, but you can use 3 only.
